title: Citizen Stargazing Network
description: A collaborative platform where amateur astronomers submit telescope observations to build a shared sky database.
problem: Many valuable astronomical observations from amateurs are never shared or structured.
solution: Provide tools to upload, tag, and validate observations and combine them into a global sky map.

title: AI-Powered Star Classification
description: Use machine learning to classify stars based on spectral and brightness data.
problem: Manual star classification is slow and error-prone.
solution: Train ML models on public astronomical datasets to automate classification.

problem: Identifying exoplanets requires analyzing massive datasets.
solution: Automate transit detection using signal-processing and ML techniques.

title: Dark Matter Simulation Playground

solution: Create simplified physics simulations accessible via browser.

problem: Students lack personalized study support.
solution: Use NLP models to adapt explanations to user learning levels.

problem: AI systems often inherit bias from data.
solution: Provide visualization and metrics to detect and reduce bias.

problem: Many job seekers lack access to career guidance.
solution: Use NLP to evaluate structure, clarity, and relevance.

title: Quantum Computing Visualizer
description: A visual tool to demonstrate qubits, superposition, and entanglement.
problem: Quantum concepts are mathematically intimidating.
solution: Use interactive visuals to explain core ideas intuitively.

title: Quantum Algorithm Learning Hub
description: A collaborative space to study and explain quantum algorithms.
problem: Few beginner-friendly resources exist.
solution: Community-written explanations with simulations.

title: AI for Space Image Enhancement
description: Use AI to enhance low-resolution telescope images.
problem: Many space images suffer from noise and blur.
solution: Apply super-resolution neural networks.

title: Quantum Random Number Generator Simulator
description: Simulate quantum randomness and compare with classical RNGs.
problem: True randomness is hard to explain.
solution: Demonstrate quantum-based randomness visually.

problem: Climate data is complex and massive.
solution: Train models on historical climate data.

description: Automatically review code for bugs and style issues.

description: Explain quantum key distribution through simulations.
problem: Quantum security is poorly understood.

description: Summarize academic papers into readable insights.
